Mining Engine¶

This is the main driver for connecting a site and gathering information in a pieminer.PageLocations object.

class pieminer.MiningEngine(site_locations: pieminer.DOM_elements.PageLocations)¶

A simple mining engine to gather information from article-hosting websites.

The locations in the DOM for each element are given by a PageLocations object in the constructor. This class then uses those instructions to gather the info.

gather(url)¶

Gather the information denoted in self.site from a single page.

get(element, several=False)¶

Default method for extracting an element from the page.

Handles errors gracefully and waits for the element to become visible before grabbing it.

Use the several=True setting if you want to grab ALL elements on the page that match the description given by element.

Note

This should only be used in a custom get_* method, so you can do more processing after getting this list of elements
